channel.title: Comments on: Using Azure Functions to add a Contact Form to a Static Site
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alan Leenhouts
item.dc:creator: Alan Leenhouts
item.description: That's pretty sweet I've done pure html sites that are hosted free on dropbox with a bit of a workaround. I will have to try to get this to work in a setup like that. I have a few hosts but I always seem to have that buddy that wants a 'free' website. the one thing that kept bugging me was not being able to add a legit contact form in it.
item.content:encoded: That’s pretty sweet I’ve done pure html sites that are hosted free on dropbox with a bit of a workaround. I will have to try to get this to work in a setup like that. I have a few hosts but I always seem to have that buddy that wants a ‘free’ website. the one thing that kept bugging me was not being able to add a legit contact form in it.
